The title says it all….
This is not MAD video nor doujin video, Kadokawa published this yesterday, replacing “Nice Boat” video. This video is supposed to be something that they publish to calm down the mass about rumor of Suzumiya Haruhi season 1’s rerun instead of publishing 2nd season. Note that they have disabled embedding, so I’ll just give you a link in each photo.
